title: French Twist: An Amelia Feelgood Mystery
description: Amelia can’t wait to get away from her nasty boss in Seattle and start a new life in France. When she arrives on remote Findlater Island for his wedding, a dead body kicks off a string of complications. Can she solve the murder before the police decide she’s the one with the strongest motive? Welcome to Findlater Island, a small island off the coast of Washington with a quaint (relocated) English village and heaps of interesting characters.French Twist is the first book of the humorous Findlater Island cozy mystery series. Fans of Agatha Raisin and Midsomer Murders will feel right at home with the adventures of amateur sleuth Amelia Feelgood.
author: Beth  McElla
